transition-fast.$description: Fast transition duration for quick interactions (150ms)

lufa.useCase: Button hovers, dropdown open, tooltip appear, quick feedback

transition-normal.$description: Normal transition duration for standard animations (250ms)

lufa.useCase: Modal animations, panel slides, standard component transitions

transition-slow.$description: Slow transition duration for deliberate animations (400ms)

lufa.useCase: Page transitions, complex animations, emphasized movements

transition-timing-function.$description: Default timing function for smooth animations (ease-in-out)

lufa.useCase: General purpose transitions, modal animations, smooth movements
